an4.172:5.1: “Reverends, I realized the textual analysis of the meaning—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained.
an4.172:5.2: In many ways I explain, teach, advocate, establish, clarify, analyze, and reveal it.
an4.172:5.3: Whoever has any doubt or uncertainty, let them ask me,
an4.172:5.4: I will answer. Our teacher is present, he who is so very skilled in our teachings.
an4.172:6.1: I realized the textual analysis of the text—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained. …
an4.172:7.1: I realized the textual analysis of terminology—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained. …
an4.172:8.1: I realized the textual analysis of eloquence—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained.
an4.172:8.2: I explain that in many ways. I teach, advocate, establish, clarify, analyze, and reveal it.
an4.172:8.3: If anyone has any doubt or uncertainty, let them ask me,
an4.172:8.4: I will answer. Our teacher is present, he who is so very skilled in our teachings.”
